sentences.sContent: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people.
sentences.sCn: 当务之急是弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

sentences.sContent: Security matters are treated with the utmost seriousness.
sentences.sCn: 安全问题受到极为严肃的对待。

sentences.sContent: ...wearing the right brand of clothes or shoes may be of the utmost importance...

trans.tranOther: You can use utmost to emphasize the importance or seriousness of something or to emphasize the way that it is done
the most that can be done
